content.detailedDescription: All in the matter of about 5 seconds. looked out over horizon(late, dark) easily distinguishable out of normal civilian flight path. travelling north fast, a green cigar-shaped object (almost night-vision color), but vivid streak beyond a mile. it made an abrupt change in direction seemingly toward me. i have seen many commercial planes in the area and helicopters before. nothing has traveled this fast before. i thought it was a fighter jet at first, but the 180 degree turn and continued propulsion was nothing i have seen in any military or commercial aircraft. once toward me it gave a brilliant white spot light. this light was quite strong. it dissipated quickly with the direction change. the white light did not reflect or project to nearby surroundings. with the white light now gone an appearance of a green cigar-shaped streak continued now south. the appearance was exact as when i first caught a glimpse. very fast 180 with apparently no reduction in speed. i reached for my phone which was almost in my hand to begin with. one look away and it was gone. absolutely no sound. there were no aircraft in the area at the time. i would put the speed near 15 times of normal commercial aircraft that taxi over halifax which are "always" traveling south and move north toward runway -- approximately 4 thousand mph. i have seen a lot of aircraft. this was nothing i even come close to recognizing.
content.summary: Green streak n abrupt 180 turn one bright light toward me, then green away s

content.detailedDescription: I was on my boat with a friend fishing just outside port jefferson harbor. we were drifting se-nw. the sky was clear and the sun was at about 40 degrees above the horizon to the wnw. i was actually just talking to my friend about how i believe in aliens and what i have heard and read about them recently. his response was he didnt really believe. so maybe 2 minutes after the conversation stopped i noticed something in the sky and said "hey look at those birds." they were flying from the south to the north west over the water and just above a tree line about 1500-2000 feet away. my friend said "thats not birds" and i immediately realized that it was something else. the best way i can describe it, it was sort of cigar shaped, basically invisible except for what i thought was birds, maybe it was giving off heat or reflective waves that looked black to me. a good example of its shape is the spring from a click pen or a cork screw shaped but but spotty, by which i mean you can only see bits of it. almost like when you see an optical illusion on the horizon on a hot sunny day, except much more visible. this is really strange, because as i write this i have the television on and south park just started, the episode where the world gets visited by aliens for the first time ever. anyway i want to guess the object was 50feet in length and 15 feet wide. we watched it for about 40 seconds until it disappeared in the distance. when i first saw it, it was just wsw flying at a controlled pace going north west. we both just stopped what we were doing and stared until it disappeared. my friend was saying "what did we just see" over and over. we were both in shock and i told him i that i believe its ufo. when we fish out here we are always scanning for brids that might be eating schools of bait fish and thats why i noticed it. if i was to draw a description of what i saw, i would draw a spotted zig zag line. :;:;:;:;;
content.summary: Almost transparent and possibly giving off heat that seemed black that made it partly visable

content.detailedDescription: Was going home from springfield mo saw a bright star like light in the sky northwest kept watching the light and it was not moving no other stars out we thought it was an odd looking star the closer to home we got wich was qnother 8miles from willard mo it looked bigger the closer to it we got we turned on our road and i was trying to hurry to see what it was we was about a half a block from my drive way and seen it over the tree tops across the road from my house we live in the country we stopped the.Car to look at the ball of light it was being very still till my boyfriend got out of the car on the side of the road it then took off south west with a low hum or buzz as it rose in the air higher we saw 3 points of white light with one red light as it was going southwest it then turned as  glide side ways took off to the northeast watched it till it was gone 2other people that we know of in the area berd the hum. we have saw several of the moving white lights we call travlers but never like this
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light in sky seen from springfield when we got home seen over tree top

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving home from work on 280 south in san francisco around 11pm. i was driving and saw a bright green flash come from the south western side of 280 as we approached the alemany/ glen park exits. i noticed it immediately thinking it was lightning but the weather was neutral and calm. it was not followed by thunder which we would have heard as the radio was off. i asked if she had noticed it but she hadn't. again another giant flash of blue light much like lightning occurred a minute or two later. we both saw this time and pondered if it could be fire works. later down the freeway we saw another green flash. after we got home and parked we exited the car. my girlfriend complained about a weird feeling. 
   as we approached our house we saw a very bright red/orange light flash behind us coming from the south east side of the city, it was followed by a buzz/hum which sounded like nothing either of us have heard before. 
   i went on facebook and asked if anyone else had seen this and one friend in redwood city wrote this:i'm in rwc, so i didn't experience it there in sf...This was just two very interesting coincidences, and i don't believe in coincidences...Now i think i should do a reading on this and see what comes up? o.O 

my other friend wrote this: glad you want to pursue this, i know i have to. saw different colored flashes of light from my window looking south (i live off ocean by city college) around 1130. one of them delivered a shock to me and my roommate. i guessed after that it was some electrical issue but they appeared to be coming from somewhere much higher than the power lines, and their sizes and shape seemed somehow intentional and i would even say they were beautiful.  it all lasted a couple minutes and i heard a number of emergency vehicles. any reports yet on this?

the next day my girlfriend left for work at 7am and came back in saying there was a helicopter circling the neighborhood. she say it was black and white and had no markings or numbers like a police helicopter would have. 

please let me know if you find any more on this.
content.summary: 4 bright flashes. green twice, blue, red. over 15 minute duration. buzz and hum.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my front step with my mother and listening to the radio, and i seen a star like object emerge from the sky behind cloud cover. it looked like a bright lit star, but i could be mistaken as it reflected light from the sun and had no marker lights like normal aircraft. the object changed its path slowly and moved southeast instead of south. just as it changed direction, a airplane (i guess privately owned) came close and might have seen it. my best friend came just in time and added on as a third person (including myself and my mother) to see it. i watched till a high tree blocked it from sight. i walked to see it for longer but it was gone. the object had no sound and i can't say if anyone apart from us seen it but, this is a very busy street.3
content.summary: Laying out on my front step, seen a small star like object emerging from the clouds. i watched this move from the north to the south east. it went over my field of vision behind a tree.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:00 pm june 4 2013 while camping at millersylvania st. park a very bright blue/white light appeared at about 70 degrees overhead from the south west moving to the north east. the light appeared like the shape of a "casper the ghost". domed on top, draping cone like down into an edge that was wave like. as if cut with big pinking shears. up and down. 
i grabbed my binoculars and looking at the light i saw a large "crown" shaped object in the blue white light. crown shaped as in a cylinder open on the top and bottom in which i could see into the interior from the bottom. the cylinder was standing on end so to speak and i could see up through it to a row of pinkish red lights on the bottom interior side which seemed to be in a "tiara" or filigree of the structure of the object. which gave it an upside-down crown like appearance. open top, open bottom, with subtle reds, blues, blacks and whites.
on the top, the opening appeared in a dome like blue white aura with a spear or spike of light that just went up sharply. on the bottom with the lights inside and structures there was no doming effect but a fairly clear view of the interior of the cylinder, kind of golden/reddish pink with blues, with a spear of light extending out farther than on the  light on top. it reminded me of the gulf breeze florida pictures but alive right there in the sky. i asked one of the camp ground hosts if he had seen anything and he had not.
content.summary: A single brilliant object appeared approx. 70 degrees overhead as a blue white "casper"  ghost shape. with binoculars it was a on end hollow cylinder.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at about 10:45 pm to move my car off the street for the evening when i noticed a very bright orange object coming from the east. i walked out to my back yard and watched the object move from the east over my position just below some low clouds to the west before it vanished into the clouds. i thought it might be some kind of slow moving meteor. i turned north to go move my car when i noticed two more bright objects coming from the north over grand traverse bay. all three objects then moved west at a slow speed and vanished. i stood in my back yard in for around five minutes wondering about what i had just observed when a fourth object moving from the east appeared. the fourth object was above cloud level and was no longer visible once it came over my position. i live close to the airport and noticed that i could hear a chopper running, however it seemed to stay at the airport. i would estimate that the sighting lasted about 4-5 minutes for the first three objects and 1-2 minutes for the fourth object.
content.summary: Four bright meteor like objects passed over traverse city.

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: Bright white orb noticed when i went out to feed my chickens tues 6-4-13 @ 5am. i saw 2 but one didn't move, the 2 were next to each other then 1 flew silently west to south west. it took about 15 seconds to cross the sky. very fast, no sound no trails

content.detailedDescription: These objects are far out in space but can be seen with the naked eye.I first started noticing these objects on june 1st at around 11o clock pm at firsrt i belived that were  satalites but then realized after seeing the iss a couple of times these things are way out there. they apear to be all diferent sizes brightness as travel all drections and speeds. they usually apear on what would be the horizon and travel across the sky till they fade out in the distance. since i first saw these objets i have more people outside with me so i know im not seeing things.If you could mawbe enlighten me on this i would really areti8ate it
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw so0mthing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Being a backyard star gazer, i see some strange things in the sky quite often which most of all are explainable to a degree most of the time but on 10-29-2012 at just a few minutes after 9:00pm. 
i had a ufo siteing i can not explain���

 i had my camera on the porch taking pictures of the moon thru the cloud remnants of hericane sandys rage as they were moving quite fast and could see stars here and there awsome picture. suddenly it was as if the clouds just stopped, about three times catching my interest,as i could not explain why��� then it happened���
several silver orbs shot thru the clouds encircling a brite rotating multicolored lit large disc object reflecting off the clouds i snaped all the pics i could in just a few minutes,it was over  the object and spheres left to the west fast kind of shooting star fast in an instant, then  i did hear jet aircraft in the air and on one image there is an aircraft below the moons bright reflection.(see pics bottom of moons light���. i have never seen orbs befor���. they were amazing as was the object 

i have no explaination but as it only lasted it seems like a few minutes���my watch was reading 9:30pm i can���t explain the time loss��� so now i report to you..  i have not reported it sooner as i was hoping it would return, but sadly after much watching it has not.
i will keep looking tho��� included with this report are my pictures for your study���.
content.summary: Object with spheres in remnent clouds of herciain sandy

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two friends were in my automotive repair shop. we stepped out of the building onto the sidewalk and i stared up at the sky and saw a series of swirling lights. i pointed to the lights and they both acknowledged seeing them also. we stared at them for quite some time (twenty minutes)and talked about calling the police to verify what we were seeing. my one friend responded that they would think we're drunk, as we were having a few beers at the time. beers aside we saw what we saw. while observing the objects a commercial airliner came into view, however it was impossible to determine the size or distance in relationship to the aircraft. the sky was clear no clouds, a bright sunny afternoon.
 the objects moved at incredible speed and seemed to vanish momentarily and reappear. we returned to the inside of the building. approximately an hour later we exited the building about to go our separate ways and we three looked up in the direction of the lights and they were still there. 
 i mentioned this event one or two occasions and as soon as the word "beer" was mentioned, well you can guess the response. but we three know what we saw on that sunny day.
content.summary: Six spherical objects each moving independently and changing directions with incredible speed

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my mothers residence. one of my neighbors had one land on her property
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing colors various green one object yellow objects and orange

content.detailedDescription:
It was the 4th of july and my wife, myself and my granddaughter were in the yard lighting small fireworks for my granddaughter's amusement. my wife suddenly said to me "what in the world is that"? i looked in the area that i was referring to and a reddish/orange colored sphere was coming in and out of the clouds. at first i thought it was a weather balloon until it started to change shapes. it changed to a tube and started to tumble then regained it's shape as a sphere. 
thinking quickly my wife grabbed the video camera and started to film the event. she was able to obtain about 10 minutes of footage before the object disappeared into the atmosphere. 
my wife's son claimed to have seen the same object at his apartment and took the camera with him and was able to collect quite a bit more footage of the same object that we had seen at the house.  
we still have the footage and would like to have someone take a look and see if they can explain what this object could be. we do not have the technology to upload the video, or else we would attach it to this statement. the video is on a 8mm cassette type format.
content.summary: A hovering sphere that would tumble into a cigar shape then reapear as a sphere and hover.

content.detailedDescription: On june-04-13 at 8:05pm my wife brother and i were out watching the sky on our back porch when my wife said jokingly "hey look a ufo" we turned to the nw sky and saw a very bright orb flying at high speed. at first we all thought it was a plane from the some what near sky harbor airport, but then we noticed an actual plane flying underneath it and behind and could tell right away it was not a plane. the planes where flashing three different colors of lights in a sequence (blue,red,white)the ord on the other hand was just a very very bright white with a soft blue center and flew in a snake like pattern we watched for about 5 min until the orb turned west and dropped suddenly behind the mountains wish i had my camera with me to give you more evidence but this definitely was not a normal flying apparatus.
content.summary: My wife,brother, and i were outside on our front porch when my watching the sky at aprox 8:05pm when my wife spotted it in the nw sky

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start by saying that i believe that i have found something that affects their ability to control people, well at least the ability to control me,not completely just affect it. its a type of pill but i don't want to make it public because i believe that people will abuse drug.
   it started when i woke up with a weird, like i have never felt before weird, pain in my inner  about the middle of my thigh at around 2 or 3 in the mourning. the pain was so bad i never even looked at the clock. it was very intense it felt like it was my muscle kinda close to the bone, but it didn't feel like muscle pain. now i can take alot of pain. now this pain had me laying on the bathroom floor in a ball. i eventually got a couple hours  of sleep.
   later that mourning, i woke up at about 8 and it was still hurting just not quite as bad. i said something to my father about what happened and he offered me a pill. when i went to sleep that night, it  started as an odd dream. 
   i was 25 at the time but in my dream i was with a friend that i kinda lost touch with but was like my brother from the end of eighth grade untill we lost touch. i had just moved back in to my parents house maybe 2 weeks before, most of my stuff was still packed. i got the feeling like i was around 14 or 15 again. we were in the hospital in town, the cops were questioning us about something, and we were trying to get away and we came across my dog that died when i was around 18, and one of my earliest memories is getting this dog, i loved her as much as anything else in the world. we made it out the door and there was a car waiting for us i put my dog in and then my friend refused to get in the car, that was the only thing he did that seems to fit him. i talked him into getting in and he did, now she was a vicious dog at times and he wouldn't even really go near her when she was dying, the way i remember him he would have never got in! 
   then we got back to my parents house, which is in the middle of a bunch of woods. i started walking down the street and all of a sudden i was walking in the middle of this field, that is about a quarter of a mile from my parents house. 
   out of the corner of my eye i see what looks like 2 or 3(i can't remember now) greys. i look over and instantly this green light catches my eye. then as soon as i focused on the light, they moved towards me in such a way..... i cant even describe it. i was instantly filled with more fear then i ever thought imaginable. i had a phobia of spiders before this, but now i see that that's not real fear. i still don't like spiders but i don't have a phobia anymore.
   as soon as they got close i woke up in my bed paralyzed. i could move my eyes and think but i couldn't make a noise or move anything. i started to fight it with everything i had, i was so confused i have never felt anything like it! i tried with everything to scream to my parents, to anyone i just wanted someone to help me, i felt so helpless. all i got out was a couple quiet noises or something, the only reason i could tell is that my dog(new dog i had for about 4 years) was staring at me tilting his head back and forth in a confused way. 
   i snapped out of it, i don't know how long it went on for it felt like an eternity, and i felt a presence and like someone (or something) had been squeezing my arms and legs pretty tightly, almost like they were still there. i felt violated in the worst way i could imagine.
   i have had several incidents since this one, all started while i was sleeping, all the way up to as recently as last tues. june 4 2013. there were some incidents when i was on the same pill but there were a couple when i was on nothing. 
   it seemed like i was regaining more and more control every time it happened until one time on march 23 2013. it looked like i was in my parents living room but i could tell i wasn't. long story short i was able to swing my limp arm at them. i was on that pill that day. now i am not a drug addict this is all happening by pure chance, my teeth are breaking apart and cause me a great deal of pain.
   i am doing this because i need help. so please i have to know exactly what is going on, maybe with hypnosis it can help me to fully overcome it and put a stop to whatever is going on. i know its not likely but please i need help!!
content.summary: I was sleeping, in my dream i was walking through a field when i noticed 2 greys. when they moved closer i woke up paralyzed.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo  over twinfalls  idaho usa,  this is  real  they are here 100%%% blinking  over city  and  like  playing  red  orange  light  blinking 23;43  night   photos  proof !!!
content.summary: Fly  over  city  vith blinking  light  red   vhite  orange

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to my front yard to take pictures of the stars. when i looked up i saw a bright, white light that was moving and appeared to be larger and lower than other stars. i ran inside and asked my partner to come and look at the object as witness. we watched the single,bright oval object steadily cross the sky with a slight wobble, no sound, just above the trees, street and river (approx.500+ft in altitude). we viewed the object for about a minute until we lost sight of it behind the trees. i did manage to capture it on video.
content.summary: Large, bright, white light, 500+ft above the tree line moving from south to east.

content.detailedDescription: I live in condo in quebec city with huge windows on the last floor of the building just aside an airplane corridor.  planes always come from east to west to land at jean-lesage international airport. on june 4th 2013 around 11h05-11h10pm, i started looking at the beautiful sky and stars. for the entire month of may, i had not been able to look so much at the stars because of the bad wheather. then while looking at the sky, an object with very bright white lights under it suddently appeared in the sky at 90 degrees angle just above my head. the object was flying west to east at jet fighter speed but made no soundi could hear. i took my googles to have a better look at it. it was obviously not an airplane. it had at least 5 to 7 very whitish bright lights undert it. i lost sight of the object after 2 minutes max. object was gaining altitude and disappeared in the sky eastward. only feeling i had was that this was not a plane.
content.summary: One craft with 5 or more very bright white lights under it flying in air corridor at jet fighter speed

content.detailedDescription: I was in billings montana sitting in my cand when i noticed a a bright light above the tree line it was flblue and red lights randomly but the white light was on most of the time.  i watched it move very slow across the sky from the ne. to the. east. it disappear. in my view when the moon was shining and the stars were gone 30 kin.S after i was still watching it. about 25 mins. of watching it i seen a orb flash above it flying across the sky west to easter and i would see random red lights around this object ....I thought it was a plane but it just didn't move fast enough and i could see it move up and down in quick motions.  and
content.summary: Moved very slowacross the sky with blinky lights of red and blue two orbs desended  n/a of where they went watch it for a good hour

content.detailedDescription: I was out during the late evening talking with two of my neighbors, while we outside we noticed a few aircraft flying over at what appeared to be at various altitudes and they had typical aircraft lights such as strobes and wing lights. we later noticed a solid, round, lit up object moving at a steady speed which seemed to be at normal cruising speed of a commercial jet except at a much lower altitude. the intensity of the light remained constant as it passed overhead in a straight line from west to east. at first i thought it may have been a satellite, but the altitude and the nature of the bright light, led me to think otherwise. the object remained in view for no more than 5 minutes, then was obscured from view by trees and houses to the east.
content.summary: Solid illuminated object that passed across the sky in a straight line and steady speed

content.detailedDescription: Large sudden illuminations of cloud cover, twice red, three times blue at long, random intervals. seen through living room window with two other witnesses in san francisco, the neighborhood of ingleside. a short buzzing sound was heard after each flash. in addition to the sound, other witnesses experieced a mild, electrical sensation shortly afterwards.
content.summary: Large sudden illuminations of cloud cover, twice red, three times blue at long, random intervals.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Near corner of beach blvd and talbert ave. we were headed to our car, lights caught our eyes, 2 rows of evenly spaced, brightly lit flying crafts, at low altitude, (about same altitude as planes landing at long beach airport)in a evenly spaced formation from east to west heading from west huntington beach, towards fountain valley. in fact a passenger plane flew within close proximity to objects, at or around 9 pm on 6.4.13.  flying objects may have been visible to pilots.  
i first checked to see if the lights were connected to a larger object, like the bottom of a spaceship, but no, they were not connected.  the lights had an orange glow, but mostly white.  the objects, travelling at same or similar speed, followed in a line and slowly ascended into low clouds, without a sign or any deviance from path.  i also considered if they were military helicopters for drones launched from seal beach base, based upon path.  but could not come up with any conclusion that seemed reasonable.  
i videotaped for a few seconds, thinking it is possible we are viewing something from another world, but did not feel threatened.  my spouse also witnessed the objects, agrees to this description and feels they are from outer space.  
we do not know if there were more than 10 because they were already passing as we exited the store.  we waited and did not see anymore coming from the west, but only looked for a couple of minutes.
content.summary: 8- 10 white lights flying in formation, 2 rows deep headed from east to west in a straight path, slowly ascending into low clouds

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i arrived home sunday night about 10:30 pm while walking to our door a strange light caught my eye to our east at first glance i knew this was not normal aircraft as there were no navigation lights it glowed a solid gold color and was traveling slowly in our direction i told my girlfriend to look up at it, as she did it began to pulsate in alternate colors from gold to red there was a light that was behind and lower in altitude that i noticed but thought was an airplane and continued to watch the pulsating light. it raised and lowered in altitude yet still traveling towards us at a very slow speed. now i realized the second light was without navigation lights as well. however the second object glowed a solid gold never dimming or pulsating and traveled at an even altitude the entire time. now the first craft began to dim and disappeared from sight. as the second craft reached the area where the first disappeared so did the second simply fade to black. i watched the area for a few more minutes yet they never did reappear. i had forgot my cell phone earlier that night and by the time she had fished hers out of her purse the second craft was fading out.I looked to my girlfriend and asked if she just saw what i saw, she agreed that whatever these were they were not anything either of us could explain. i personally am an avid believer in the fact that we are visited from other life forms and have witnessed similar sightings in recent times.
content.summary: 2 orbs not in unison but together in same direction of travel

content.detailedDescription: Observed a very bright white constant light not landing lights or indicator lights (red green alternating)..  it move from a south southeast direction that appeared to be parallel to position.  however it descended to a northeast position to mountain range at least 20 miles away..  i would say it could have been a plane with landing lights on but it was to bright for the distance it was away from me...
content.summary: Bright ball thought was sat at first then plane but moved slow and constant bright light

content.detailedDescription: My son and i just got home from a bb king show. we were outside in the back yard telling my wife about the show. it is a very nice clear evening and enjoying the night air. my son and i saw the object at the same time. my first reaction was,"what the hell is that". it was moving slowly, or at least slower than you would expect an aircraft of that altitude or size. it just wasnt right. it moved in a steady straight line. no sound what so ever. we watched it for about a min or less, not sure. it had a short cigar to blimp shape. was orange on the bottom and and deep red on the top. it actually looked like a blimp on fire. i have never seen such an objet as this and we live close to an air force base. we are used to seeing aircraft. it was so awesome that i couldnt stop looking at the sky so i stayed outside for awhile. about 25 min later,(approx: 11:43pm) i saw a couple high altitude jets fly over. maybe a minute later i saw a white pulse of light, no sound. just after the light, a lower altitude prop. plane flew over. i saw one more pulse of light in the same area around 12:10 pm. i have no idea what we saw but i am sure it was a controlled craft of some kind.
content.summary: Looked like a slow but steady moving blimp on fire.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to my backyard deck to smoke a stogie, looked at the clear sky and watched this weird occurrence. just looking up, i saw a star, none in particular....But, then...A object, as big as the star as it appeared to me, came from the star at the 8 o'clock position with a distinct line coming from the star and was sling shotted counter clock-wise towards the south. the ufo disappeared at 5 o'clock. i've didn't know what to think....Maybe a ship was using the star as a sling shot, or maybe e.T.? if you can look at the star 'rasalhague' at that time period, i'd really like some answers.

                     thanks, bruce 


ps. kinda looked like looking at a watch....Where the second hand was holding a rock, then disappearing.
content.summary: A hurling off the star rasalhague, distintict line and arc

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to a family reunion in south georgia on 10/08/2011.

i was s/b on i believe highway u.S. 1 between alma and waycross, georgia. the southern half of the skyline had clouds, the northern half was clear. i saw what appeared at first to be a star that was bright white in color but as i approached the object which was probably a mile or more in height, i noticed that it was not a star as the clouds would have obscured the light and this object was below the cloud line.

at this point i asked my daughter to move from the rear to the front seat to look at what i thought may be a helicopter light as the light was stationary. as we drew closer to the lighted object, we noticed that it was now light blue and pulsating rapidly and at that time decided it may be a ufo. it was stationary and as i mentioned, it was rapidly pulsating what appeared to be a light blue light.

we watched the object for another mile or so and as i was looking at the object, it vanished. it did not move away quickly, it just ceased to exist any longer.
content.summary: Whiite then changed to blue pulsating light underneath cloud cover, then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back with my little brother from the gym. located in queens new york.  when i glanced up to the sky and noticed a white bright light flying over the airplane traffic. i could tell the difference from this object and the airplanes and helicopters. this had no air craft lights. i was able to take three pictures. the craft disappeared into the horizon. some one else had to see it. even the airplanes in the area may have caught it on radar. when you zoom in on the pictures you can notice something strange. i thought it was a plane at first or a helicopter. it flew in a straight line into the horizon. it probably past near laguardia airport. i was mesmerized how it was just cruising past the planes. it was bright and beautiful
content.summary: Walking back from the gym with my little brother. noticed a white bright light cruising above the airplane traffic. i could distinguish the aircraft from this object. i took three pictures with my iphone 5. when i zoomed in it looked strange.

content.detailedDescription: Amber, shape change , color change , communication.  this is by no means everything. prayers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I believe you should contact me. love and prayers always.

content.detailedDescription: Iwent outside to have a smoke on m'y back porch, and as i was on the phone with m'y mother i seen what i thought was jus a bit bright star as i was admiring it i noticed i was flying in the sky and beneath it a plane was flying it looked like a gas of blue like a bright star as it flew from the se of cornwall near the st lawrence river to the mort it was like domething shot out of it or sonething beamed down fast but it kept going... 2 min aproximatly after they dissappearred two more black helicopters flew by... and then i freaked out went in aide to grab anotgwr smoke to calm down and when i went back outside and i thought it was anotger plane but as it passed over there was a humming and it wasbt a plane none of the lights flashed or flickered it jus brightened they were a brownish copper with a red light. as it passed all u h���re was like a swishing of the wind and as it flee away it stayed bright did not flicker .. but dissapearred and came back about four times then jus canished then annother black helicopter went iin the same direction..
content.summary: First one wa like a giant bright burning star.. second was like a diamond plane with lights that burned did not flash!
